name: Little Journey (dashabee)
description:
A mini game (with fun facts included!) about one hungry little guinea pig who's looking for her lettuce and finds herself new friends along the way.

Made with bitsy editor by me

Inspired by andimlenny's project have you seen my succulent? 

Dedicated to my four guinea pigs: Pacha, Lokki, Biscuit, and Bonita:)
